basics.name: Seth Han
basics.label: Undergraduate Researcher, Dartmouth College
basics.summary: Undergraduate researcher focused on machine learning for cyber-resilient power systems and topology-aware weakly supervised semantic segmentation.

work.name: CREATE Lab, Dartmouth College
work.summary: Machine learning for robust state estimation of a virtual power plant under cyber attacks.
highlights: Advisors: Prof. Junbo Zhao, Dr. Alaa Selim, Yingrui Fan

work.name: School of Arts & Sciences, Dartmouth College
work.summary: Topology-aware weakly supervised semantic segmentation for anomaly detection in manufacturing.

work.name: Drice
work.summary: Drone-based black ice detection and mapping using YOLOX.
highlights: Advisors: Hyunwook Chung and Donghwan Shin

work.name: Cheongshim International Academy
work.summary: Gait-recognition-based missing person identification from CCTV footage.

work.name: Cheongshim International Academy
work.summary: Heavy metal absorption using used mushroom compost.

work.name: Drice
work.summary: Built and patented an AI-powered drone system for real-time black ice detection.
highlights: Secured $11K+ in R&D funding from the Ministry of Science of Korea, Ministry of Education of Korea, and POSCO DX

work.name: Enuma, Inc.
work.summary: Analyzed user logs from B2G edtech products in global markets using SQL and Python.

work.name: Justiz
work.summary: Built a language analysis platform to detect malicious comments and enable data-driven legal action.
highlights: Secured $11K+ in R&D funding from the Ministry of Science of Korea

work.name: Enuma, Inc.
work.summary: Researched edtech trends and supported development of government-certified digital English and Mathematics textbooks in South Korea.

volunteer.summary: Organized the Social Blueprint Challenge and led a social entrepreneurship curriculum for 30+ associates.
Selected as 1 of 15 students for entrepreneurship and leadership training.
Year-long program covering global health, climate change, gender in politics, international development, and security.
Produced 10+ film and commercial video projects; most recent film 'Yellow Ghost' was selected for the Busan International Film Festival 2025.

projects.name: Cyber-resilient state estimation for virtual power plants
